shri lankawen thawath korona wairas aasadithayan 1018k warthawi thibenawa.ee anuwa merata samastha aasadithayan sankhyawa dakwenne 297,534k lesatayi.emenma ada dinaye thawath korona aasadithawa prathikara labu 1405 deneku purna suwaya laba rohalwalin pitawagos thibenawa.ee anuwa merata suwaya labu samastha sankhyawa 269,007 k dakwa ihala yana bawayi saukhya amathyanshaye wasangatha roga widya eekakaya pawasanne.

korona wasangatha thaththwaya hethuwen oostreliyawe melban nagarayata panawa athi agulu damime sima thawaduratath dadi kirimata baladharin piyawara gena atha.ee anuwa nagaraye agulu damime sima thawath sathi dekakin dirgha kara thibe.nagarayen wartha wana korona aasadithayin sankhyawe salakiya yuthu aduwimak thawamath daknata nolabima eeta hethuwa bawa baladharihu pawasathi.wiktoriyanu prantha agramathya daniyel andaෲs mahatha pawasuwe labana 28 wanida dakwa aguludamime sima sulu lihil kirimak sahithawa kriyathmaka bawayi.oostreliyawa thula korona wasangathaya pathirayame dewani ralle mulasthanaya bawata wiktoriya pranthaya pathwi atha.
pawathina ayahapath kalagunayath samaga akunu sara wadima hethuwen pasal sisuwek jiwithakshayata pathwi thibenawa.

manawakaya, melowa yam sthriyak ho purushayek athin payin ho dadu muguru walin ho aayudha walin ho saththwayanta hinsa pida karanne da hethema akusala karmaya balayen apayehi upatha laba duk windinneya.
eyin wana paurusha haniya, mano-kayika dubalatha men ma atham amanushika sansiddhin da aduwak nomatha.
